meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: APPLE

div.a: IPhone 5: A Dispatch From The Front Lines

div.div: There were only about seven people camped outside Apple’s Fifth Avenue store on Sept. 17, waiting for the Sept. 21 release of the iPhone 5. In a one-hour period no fewer than a dozen journalists visited those seven people. This was the observer effect in full—the act of watching a thing didn’t just change the thing being watched, it was the thing itself.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qpn7xd&via=Digg&text=IPhone 5: A Dispatch From The Front Lines

div.div: RETAIL WARS

Wal-Mart Stores Inc will no longer sell Amazon.com Inc's Kindle products, making it the second major chain to stop selling Amazon's devices, as the world's largest retailer makes a bet that consumers are more interested in other gadgets.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uhz3Xg&via=Digg&text=Wal-Mart Drops Amazon Kindle

div.div: iOS 7: FIND MY CAT

div.a: Why Can't Technology Find My Lost Cat?

div.div: "Earlier this week, I came home to find my two kittens gone. I lost my shit. And I found out that it's hard to track pets even in a world of GPS and microchips."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qpkrj2&via=Digg&text=Why Can't Technology Find My Lost Cat?

div.div: GOODBYE NAUSEA
"My avatar still moves. New uploads, however, do not. The animated GIF avatar isn't quite dead, but it appears to have been sentenced to death."

li.div: Twitter, I love you, but you're bringing me down: buzzfeed.com/jwherrman/rip...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P3NGI9&via=Digg&text=R.I.P. Animated Twitter Avatars

div.div: AMISH PARADISE LOST

div.a: Beard-Cutting Amish Group Convicted Of Hate Crimes

div.div: A group of Amish walked to the Federal Courthouse in Cleveland on Thursday. A federal jury found Samuel Mullet Sr., the leader of a renegade Amish sect, and 15 followers guilty of conspiracy and hate crimes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P3xO8D&via=Digg&text=Beard-Cutting Amish Group Convicted Of Hate Crimes

div.div: INFOGRAPHIC

div.a: What Kinds Of Counterfeit Goods Does The U.S. Confiscate At Its Borders?

div.div: Every year, U.S. Customs and Border Protection officials manage to identify and seize tens of thousands of products—everything from ubiquitous fake Louis Vuitton handbags to imitation cancer drugs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NEcrNP&via=Digg&text=What Kinds Of Counterfeit Goods Does The U.S. Confiscate At Its Borders?

div.div: GAMBLING

div.a: Why Online Poker Should Be Legal

div.div: Online poker was growing fast in the U.S. until Congress passed the Unlawful Internet Gambling Enforcement Act of 2006, which pretty much shut things down. The ruling was based in large part on the government’s reasoning that poker is predominantly a game of chance as opposed to a game of skill. But is this classification correct?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PXwSFG&via=Digg&text=Why Online Poker Should Be Legal

div.div: I USED TO LOVE H.I.M.
For many in the hip hop community, the honeymoon is over.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SEmVtC&via=Digg&text=Is Hip Hop Over Obama?

div.div: COLORS

div.a: How Men And Women Name Colors

div.div: This interactive shows you how men and women differ in how they describe colors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NEZXWr&via=Digg&text=How Men And Women Name Colors

div.div: THE 1800s SUCKED
This is a time lapse world map showing all the battles that have occurred in the past 1000 years. Worth sitting through the whole thing to see Europe go absolutely bonkers in the late 1930s.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SafPlw&via=Digg&text=1000 Years Of War In 5 Minutes

div.div: THE BEST OF THE WORST SCIENCE HAS TO OFFER

div.a: Liveblog Of The Ig Nobel Prize Ceremony

div.div: "Boston! Sci is in you! And I am here at the Sanders Theatre in Cambridge, for the 22nd First Annual Ig Nobel Prize Ceremony."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NFmMcm&via=Digg&text=Liveblog Of The Ig Nobel Prize Ceremony

div.div: EAT YOUR PROBLEMS

div.a: Comfort Food Is Real: Scientists Discover 'Good Mood Foods'

div.div: It turns out that molecules in chocolate, a variety of berries and foods containing omega-3 fatty acids positively affect mood.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uuo639&via=Digg&text=Comfort Food Is Real: Scientists Discover 'Good Mood Foods'

div.div: FIRST CLASS OR BUST

div.a: FedEx And UPS Pledge To Not Ship Research Mammals

div.div: The two biggest cargo carriers, under activist pressure, affirm that they will not ship research mammals and non-human primates

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R2GEWR&via=Digg&text=FedEx And UPS Pledge To Not Ship Research Mammals

div.div: APPLE FAIL

div.a: Careful Apple! You're Giving People Flashbacks To The Horrible Old Microsoft Monopoly Days

div.div: The feisty competitiveness with which the company has always attacked critics and competitors now seems like self-serving bullying. And it's reminding people of Microsoft's tactics back in the Windows-monopoly days.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qppr7p&via=Digg&text=Careful Apple! You're Giving People Flashbacks To The Horrible Old Microsoft Monopoly Days

div.div: SLICK WILLY

div.a: Monica Lewinsky Set To Reveal Bill Clinton's Sex Secrets In Tell-All

div.div: Monica Lewinsky is promising to reveal secret love letters to Bill Clinton and his penchant for kinky sex in a new tell-all about her days as his favorite intern.

li.div: Multiple levels of nuts RT @ericatwiley: It's literally NOT POSSIBLE Monica Lewinsky getting $12 million for memoir. nypost.com/p/news/national...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UrpbIZ&via=Digg&text=Monica Lewinsky Set To Reveal Bill Clinton's Sex Secrets In Tell-All

div.div: #SHOTSFIRED

div.a: Report: Google Is Working On A Map App For iOS 6

div.div: Sources say that Google is preparing a Google Maps app for iOS6, which will appear in time. No official statement has been made and there will inevitably be questions over whether Apple will approve it in the App Store.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sbn4K5&via=Digg&text=Report: Google Is Working On A Map App For iOS 6

div.div: MODERATION

div.a: Math May Have Just Found A Solution To Extremism

div.div: Historians know that the best way to replace an extremist view is with an equally extreme opposing view. Now mathematicians have discovered how to make moderation spread instead.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UkufvO&via=Digg&text=Math May Have Just Found A Solution To Extremism

div.div: BOOOOOM

div.a: Soccer Player Tosses Grenade Off Pitch Right Before It Explodes

div.div: Sepahan midfielder Adel Kolahkaj picked up a small, black object and tossed it away from the pitch. Turns out that object was some kind of mini grenade or firecracker, which exploded upon landing, causing the referee and his assistant to run for their lives.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QoTxdW&via=Digg&text=Soccer Player Tosses Grenade Off Pitch Right Before It Explodes

div.div: STUFF WHITE PEOPLE LIKE
White-washing the illegal drug market involves depicting it like markets wealthy viewers are more comfortable and familiar with, namely those of the farmers market or the local pharmacy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4BdVH&via=Digg&text=Why You're Addicted To 'Breaking Bad'

div.div: JTT

div.a: Limbaugh: Penises Now ’10% Smaller’ Because Of ‘Feminazis’

div.div: Rush Limbaugh on Thursday lashed out at feminists — who he called “feminazis” — over the news that male genitalia are shrinking.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QFOrHU&via=Digg&text=Limbaugh: Penises Now ’10% Smaller’ Because Of ‘Feminazis’

div.div: BREAKING BAD OR YOUR LOVE LIFE?

div.a: TV's Negative Impact On Romantic Relationships

div.div: The status of a romantic relationship could be in jeopardy if the couple or an individual in the relationship are frequent television watchers, according to a study from Albion College.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RoqedD&via=Digg&text=TV's Negative Impact On Romantic Relationships

div.div: PLUS THE COST OF CANCER

div.a: Poor Smokers Spend 25% Of Their Income On Cigarettes

div.div: A new study claims that poor smokers spend a shocking amount of their income on cigarettes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PIUzhv&via=Digg&text=Poor Smokers Spend 25% Of Their Income On Cigarettes

div.div: IT'S BEAUTIFUL ON THE INSIDE TOO

The iPhone 5 does not officially launch until tomorrow, but a few units have been trickling out and German site iPhone-Garage has been able to obtain one of these units and perform an initial teardown of the device.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UtyND8&via=Digg&text=The First iPhone 5 Teardown

div.div: INTERSPECIES COOPERATION
The title says it all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R12U3g&via=Digg&text=Pig Saves Goat
